welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Ekeren, Belgium! Known for its beautiful parks and historic architecture, we invite you to immerse yourself in our city's unique charm and discover all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Deurne/ Antwerp Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gilze-Rijen Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Brussels Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for low-cost carriers and charter flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: A newer terminal dedicated to handling long-haul flights and flights to non-Schengen countries.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the network and follow the instructions to access.
